channel.title: Posts on loggg
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on loggg

item.title: File descriptors and mmap
item.description: A quick and practical walkthrough of how file descriptors work in Linux, how the OS tracks open files through tables, and how mmap lets us skip expensive reads and writes by mapping files directly into memory.

item.title: Pages and Layouts in Mint
item.description: Understand how memory pages work in operating systems, and how Mint uses them to store structured data safely.
